DataElement.preferredName: Diagnostic Imaging Laboratory Technologist Certification Performed Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator that asks whether the imaging technologist is certified.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Diagnostic Imaging Laboratory Technologist Certification Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to diagnostic imaging (any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation) being performed by a certified (a designation indicating its suitability for a specific purpose) laboratory technologist (a technically trained person who performs laboratory activities and provides laboratory analysis).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation..

Concepts.definition: Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.

Property.preferredDefinition: A technically trained person who performs laboratory activities and provides laboratory analysis according to laboratory policies, procedures and protocols.:A designation earned by a person that indicates that the person has specific knowledge, skills, or abilities in the view of the certifying body.  Similarly, a product or process can achieve certification indicating its suitability for a specific purpose.:Performed; carried out.

Concepts.definition: A technically trained person who performs laboratory activities and provides laboratory analysis according to laboratory policies, procedures and protocols.

The process by which a person demonstrates specific knowledge, skills, or abilities in the view of a certifying body.  Similarly, the process by which a product or process can achieve certification indicating its suitability for a specific purpose.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk
